name: Cleithrophobia (2014)
description:
My First RPG Maker VX Ace Horror game, I hope you like it!

Developed and Created by Jordan Wright known as JEliteW

Special Thanks to the makers of the Sprites, sounds and music

Credit to all the features included in the Game.

WARNING: THIS GAME CONTAINS DETAILED LIGHTING EFFECTS THAT MAY REQUIRE A DECENT COMPUTER TO RUN. IF YOU ARE RECORDING THE GAME, MAKE SURE THE FPS (Frames per second) ON THE RECORDING PROGRAM IS SET TO A HIGH VALUE. OTHERWISE YOU MAY SLOW DOWN DURING CHASE SCENES.
